posts.excerpt: package WORK; import java.awt.BorderLayout; import java.awt.EventQueue; import java.awt.FileDialog; import javax.swing.JFrame; import javax.swing.JPanel; import javax.swing.border.EmptyBorder; import javax.swing.JButton;
posts.text: package WORK; import java.awt.BorderLayout; import java.awt.EventQueue; import java.awt.FileDialog; import javax.swing.JFrame; import javax.swing.JPanel; import javax.swing.border.EmptyBorder; import javax.swing.JButton; import javax.swing.JTextField; import java.awt.Font; import javax.swing.JLabel; import java.awt.Color; import java.awt.event.ActionListener; import java.io.*; import java.io.FileOutputStream; import java.io.InputStream; import java.net.*; import java.awt.event.ActionEvent; import javax.swing.JTextArea; import javax.swing.JScrollPane; import java.net.URLConnection; import javax.swing.JMenuBar; import java.awt.TextArea; public class URLConnecton_test extends JFrame { JPanel contentPane; TextArea txt; /** * Launch the application. */ public static void main(String[] args) { EventQueue.invokeLater(new Runnable() { public void run() { try { URLConnecton_test frame = new URLConnecton_test(); frame.setVisible(true); } catch (Exception e) { e.printStackTrace(); } } }); } /** * Create the frame. */ public URLConnecton_test() { setDefaultCloseOperation(JFrame.EXIT_ON_CLOSE); setBounds(100, 100, 1031, 581); contentPane = new JPanel(); contentPane.setBackground(Color.WHITE); contentPane.setBorder(new EmptyBorder(5, 5, 5, 5)); setContentPane(contentPane); contentPane.setLayout(null); JScrollPane scrollPane = new JScrollPane(); scrollPane.setBounds(0, 0, 1013, 534); contentPane.add(scrollPane); JMenuBar menuBar = new JMenuBar(); scrollPane.setColumnHeaderView(menuBar); JLabel lblNewLabel = new JLabel("URL:"); lblNewLabel.setFont(new Font("宋体", Font.PLAIN, 18)); lblNewLabel.setBackground(Color.WHITE); menuBar.add(lblNewLabel); JTextArea text_url = new JTextArea(); text_url.setFont(new Font("Monospaced", Font.PLAIN, 18)); text_url.setBackground(Color.WHITE); menuBar.add(text_url); JButton btnNewButton = new JButton("\u83B7\u53D6\u6E90\u7801"); btnNewButton.setFont(new Font("宋体", Font.PLAIN, 18)); btnNewButton.setBackground(Color.WHITE); btnNewButton.addActionListener(new ActionListener() { public void actionPerformed(ActionEvent e) { txt.setText(null); try { URL url = new URL(text_url.getText()); try{ InputStream is =url.openStream(); InputStreamReader isr = new InputStreamReader(is,"UTF-8"); BufferedReader bf = new BufferedReader(isr); String s=bf.readLine(); while(s!=null) { txt.append(s+"\n"); s=bf.readLine(); } bf.close(); isr.close(); is.close(); } catch (IOException e1) { } }catch (MalformedURLException e2) { } } }); menuBar.add(btnNewButton); JButton button = new JButton("\u4FDD\u5B58\u6587\u4EF6"); button.setFont(new Font("宋体", Font.PLAIN, 18)); button.setBackground(Color.WHITE); button.addActionListener(new ActionListener() { public void actionPerformed(ActionEvent e) { try{ JFrame jf = new JFrame(); FileDialog fd = new FileDialog(jf,"保存",FileDialog.SAVE); fd.setVisible(true); String filepath = fd.getDirectory(); String filename = fd.getFile(); try{ FileOutputStream fos = new FileOutputStream(filepath+filename); String s; s=txt.getText(); fos.write(s.getBytes()); fos.close(); }catch (Exception ex) { } }catch (Exception ex) { } } }); menuBar.add(button); JButton btnNewButton_1 = new JButton("\u83B7\u53D6\u56FE\u7247"); btnNewButton_1.setFont(new Font("宋体", Font.PLAIN, 18)); btnNewButton_1.addActionListener(new ActionListener() { public void actionPerformed(ActionEvent e) { try{ URL url=new URL("输入图片网址"); try{ InputStream is = url.openStream(); //保存在D盘，名为pic8 File out = new File("d:\\pic8.jpg"); FileOutputStream fos = new FileOutputStream(out); byte[] buff = new byte[1024]; int n = is.read(buff); while(n!=-1) { fos.write(buff,0,n); n = is.read(buff); } fos.close(); is.close(); } catch(IOException ex1){ } } catch(Exception ex){ } } }); btnNewButton_1.setBackground(Color.WHITE); menuBar.add(btnNewButton_1); txt = new TextArea(); scrollPane.setViewportView(txt); } }
